p: In ยง5, I compare the time dependence of daily confirmed new cases if different measures would have been taken at the beginning of April in Japan. I also compare various policies characterized by a combination of differing degrees of testing/quarantine and societal lockdown and show that the quarantine measure is more efficient than the lockdown measure to control the outbreak. Discussion is given in ยง6, where an effective reproduction number appropriate to COVID-19 is introduced.
